text: Robert R. McLeod (born 1952) is a Canadian politician. He is a member of the Legislative Assembly of the Northwest Territories and the 12th Premier of the Northwest Territories from October 26, 2011 until October 24, 2019. ==References== ==Other websites== *Bob McLeod Legislature biography Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:Premiers of the Northwest Territories
title: Bob McLeod (politician)
